PageTitle: display bgp vpnv4 multicast all update-peer-group
FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all update-peer-group command is used to display the update peer group information of the BGP VPNv4-Multicast address family.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 multicast all update-peer-group [ index <update-group-index> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specify the index of the update peer group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 multicast all update-peer-group
The VPNV4 instance's update peer group number : 1
Keep buffer update peer group number : 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all routing-table command is used to display the update peer group information of the BGP VPNv4-Multicast address family.
